sentence.Network_en: The results showed that the synergetic effects could be improved at appropriate combined ratio.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一定的配比下,钙、镁型清净剂对有机钼的抗磨减摩性能有增效作用.

sentence.Network_en: The synergetic effect of - crystallization and reactive effect on high temperature oxidation were summarized in this letter.
sentence.Network_cn: 总结了目前广为研究的微晶化和活性元素效应在合金高温氧化过程中的作用,并讨论了二者的协同效应.

sentence.Network_en: Both process optimization and synergetic work entail support from a powerful information system.
sentence.Network_cn: 流程优化和协同作业都需要有强有力的信息系统的支持.
